abstract: Phillip Alder Bridge column; diagrammed deal shows one instance when it is legal to mislead opponents, normally not allowed in bridge.
lead_paragraph: In poker it is acceptable to try to mislead your opponents. Perhaps you may seem uncertain about betting when you have a very strong hand. That would be a tad naïve, but it will work against some players.

headline.main: Knowing When and How to Bluff Your Opponents
headline.seo: Bridge - Knowing When and How to Bluff Your Opponents
